E

EatAction - Class in game.actions
Special Action that allows Actor to eat and recover health points.
EatAction(Item) - Constructor for class game.actions.EatAction
Create a EatAction using an Item that specifies the food which is in the inventory of the Player or the location of current Actor for Human and Farmer.
EatBehaviour - Class in game.behaviours
A class that generates an EatAction if the current Actor is damaged and standing on a Food.
EatBehaviour() - Constructor for class game.behaviours.EatBehaviour
 
EDIBLE - game.ItemCapability
An Item is capable of being edible.

execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.actions.EatAction
Allow the Actor who perform this Action to recover health points and the food to be removed from inventory for Player and from the location of Actor for Human and Farmer, looking as though Actor eat food to heal the damage.

execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.actions.FireSniperRifleAction
Depending on the actor and the target's AimCapablity, actor will have 2 possible options after choosing to fire sniper rifle First possible option is AimAction Second possible option is ShootAction if target has not been aimed before, they can be aimed or shoot If target is aimied for the first time, they can be aimed or shoot if target is aimed for the second time, they can be shoot only
execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.actions.HarvestAction

execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.actions.QuitGameAction

execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.actions.ShootAction
If target is aim for one round, damage dealt will be double if target is aim for second round, it will be kill instantly Provided that actor has concentration.
execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.actions.SowAction
Set the ground of sowLocation to be a Crop.
execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.actions.SummonZombieAction

execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.actions.VanishAction

execute(Actor, GameMap) - Method in class game.actions.ZombieAttackAction
Attacks the target Zombie has higher missing rate for bite attack than punch attack if the Zombie lands a bite attack, it heals for 5 hitpoints
